p: Based on the highest case load of patients with LF in any institution in Nigeria, ISTH developed a ribavirin regimen different from the WHO recommendation which is here referred to as ‘Irrua regimen’ or ‘Irrua ribavirin treatment regimen’. 27 Apart from a higher loading dose and a lower total daily dose administered during the course of the Irrua regimen, the drug is usually administered once per day.
